title: Pardes Mein Hai Mera Dil SPOILER: Show To Take A Leap; Raghav & Naina To Get Separated!
text:
Â» Pardes Mein Hai Mera Dil SPOILER: Show To Take A Leap; Raghav & Naina To Get Separated! Pardes Mein Hai Mera Dil SPOILER: Show To Take A Leap; Raghav & Naina To Get Separated! Star Plus' Pardes Mein Hai Mera Dil will soon take a short leap, post which Raghav and Naina will be shown staying separately. Updated: Friday, February 10, 2017, 15:07 [IST] Subscribe to Filmibeat 
In Star Plus' popular soap Pardes Mein Hai Mera Dil , the Mehras claim Raghav's patent to be theirs, and sell it to Mr. Khurana for a whopping price. Raghav is insulted by Mr. Khurana when he gives a presentation of his invention (an electric device, which has a self-cleaning feature and runs on solar energy). 
On the other hand, Ahana asks Naina to become a surrogate mother for money, who flatly refuses the offer. Khurana insults Naina ( Drashti Dhami ), when she claims that he has done injustice to Raghav and asks her to bring a whopping money, if Raghav wants to do business with him. (Check out the latest spoiler below). Naina Accepts The Deal 
Naina has agreed to become a surrogate mother to Ahana's child, as she cannot see Raghav failing in his efforts. In return, Ahana will agree to give a hefty price, so that Raghav can set up his business. Raghav & Naina 
Naina will make a huge sacrifice. In the upcoming episodes, Raghav will get to know about Naina's pregnancy and feels betrayed. He will be unaware of the surrogacy deal and feels that she has cheated on him. Raghav Demands Divorce 
As per the latest spoiler, Raghav will demand divorce from Naina for betraying him. Well, if reports are to be believed, this will lead to the couple's separation. Raghav will devote his energy to become a successful businessman. Show Takes A Leap 
With this, the show will go for a leap. If reports are to be believed, the show will take a short leap for 3 to 4 months. Arjun Bijlani 
When a leading entertainment portal contacted Arjun, he confirmed the news. He said, "Yes. The show is taking a leap, but we have not yet been informed about the details." Raghav & Naina Separated 
It is also being said that the show failed to gain enough ratings and that's the reason, the makers have planned a leap to spice up the story. Post the leap, Raghav and Naina will be shown living separately. Will Raghav Get To Know The Truth? 
Will Raghav get to know about Naina's huge sacrifice for him? Will the couple re-unite? Wait and watch. 
In The Last Episode... 
An enraged Raghav fights with Veer for selling his invention to Khurana. He even asks Balraj as to why he cheated him. Balraj will tell him that he invented a product using their resources, thereby concluding that the product belongs to the Mehras, and not him. 
They will thrash Raghav. Naina arrives and takes him back. She dresses his wounds and wipes his tears. The next day, Naina thinks as to how to help Raghav to become successful. She meets Ahana and tells her that she is ready to become a surrogate mother, only to help her husband. 
Ahana is happy, but tells her to keep this news as a secret. Khurana arrives to meet Raghav. He enquires him about Naina and tells him about how Naina lashed out on him. Raghav supports Naina.
